languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс молча взирает на саванта, а затем опускает голову и {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}что-то произносит{/d} — слишком тихо, чтобы вы могли услышать.{/n}
{n}Heinrix stares at the Sage, saying nothing, then looks down and {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}mutters something{/d} too quietly for you to hear.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс молча взирает на саванта, а затем опускает голову и {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}что-то произносит{/d} — слишком тихо, чтобы вы могли услышать.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希盯着艾米莉娜，一言不发。随后，他低下了头，{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}小声嘀咕了几句{/d}，你听不清他说了些什么。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at the Sage, saying nothing, then looks down and {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}mutters something{/d} too quietly for you to hear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希盯着艾米莉娜，一言不发。随后，他低下了头，小声嘀咕了几句，你听不清他说了些什么。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix observa a la sabia sin decir nada, y después baja la mirada al suelo y {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}murmura algo{/d} en voz demasiado baja como para oírla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at the Sage, saying nothing, then looks down and {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}mutters something{/d} too quietly for you to hear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix observa a la sabia sin decir nada, y después baja la mirada al suelo y murmura algo en voz demasiado baja como para oírla.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは何も言わずに賢者を見つめる。しばらくしてうつむくと、早口で聞こえないほど静かな声で{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}何かをつぶやいて{/d}いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at the Sage, saying nothing, then looks down and {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}mutters something{/d} too quietly for you to hear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは何も言わずに賢者を見つめる。しばらくしてうつむくと、早口で聞こえないほど静かな声で{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}何かをつぶやいて{/d}いた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix fixe la sage sans un mot, avant de baisser les yeux et de {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}murmurer quelque chose{/d} que vous n'entendez pas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at the Sage, saying nothing, then looks down and {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}mutters something{/d} too quietly for you to hear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix fixe la sage sans un mot, avant de baisser les yeux et de murmurer quelque chose que vous n'entendez pas.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix starrt die Weise an, schweigt, senkt dann den Blick und {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}murmelt etwas{/d} so leise, dass du es nicht verstehst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at the Sage, saying nothing, then looks down and {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}mutters something{/d} too quietly for you to hear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix starrt die Weise an, schweigt, senkt dann den Blick und murmelt etwas so leise, dass du es nicht verstehst.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, hiçbir şey söylemeden Âlim'e bakıyor. Sonrasında gözlerini indirip duyamayacağın bir tonla {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}bir şeyler mırıldanıyor{/d}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stares at the Sage, saying nothing, then looks down and {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}mutters something{/d} too quietly for you to hear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, hiçbir şey söylemeden Âlim'e bakıyor, artından gözlerini yere indiriyor ve duyamayacağın bir sesle {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Humane}bir şeyler mırıldanıyor{/d}.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
